title: Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, soft, and comfortable, with one mentioning it's not itchy at all. The size runs a little big according to multiple reviews. The pattern receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting the floral design could be more dominant.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars win!!!
items.body: sweater is so soft, not itchy at all, and super comfy. Its absolutely gorgeous. The pattern is not as visible as the model shows, but its still an absolute beauty. I get many compliments every time I wear it. I washed on gentle and line dry. held up nicely, no shrinkage. Great cozy sweater for the price. May buy another in a different color. Amazon fashion win for sure! Read more
items.author: mindy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars cute but huge
items.body: I purchased a size small and wow I was swimming in it. I think an extra small would be too big as well - ah well. it is cute though! Read more
items.author: LaVie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: Love this! The subtle pattern and half zip make it look very classy with a pop of fun. The fabric is a medium weight and soft enough to be comfortable. I'm 5'2 and about 140 lbs and the medium was perfect. Read more
items.author: Alex

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Photo beautiful product not so much
items.body: Size chart is off , ordered a large & swimming in it. Also, it really doesn’t look like the photo. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color
items.body: Love this sweater but its not as dark brown as photo. The color is more washed out. But love it. Its comfy and warm. Runs a bit large but is my fav new sweater Read more
items.author: Melissa L Moore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great casual sweater!
items.body: Love it! Very comfortable, get lots of compliments on the quarter zip style. I would say it runs a little big, but easy to wear a T-shirt or tank top underneath. I ordered a large, but a medium probably would have fit me a little better. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Purchase
items.body: Love it! Runs true to size, soft on inside and outside. For reference I did an XL and I am 5’3 230lbs Read more
items.author: HSly

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap looking in real life.
items.body: I returned this. It was cheap looking. The flowers looking tacky in real life and it was too short. Read more
items.author: MS

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy Floral, Black Floral, Grey Floral, Coffee Brown Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
